articles.author: Andrea Malan
articles.description: The SUV to be built in Poland will be the first Fiat Chrysler model on a PSA Group platform as part of the Stellantis merger. It will be followed by small models from Alfa Romeo and Fiat.
articles.title: New small Jeep to go into production in July 2022, sources say - Automotive News Europe

articles.content: POTSDAM, Germany — The Gulf Stream System is at its weakest in 1,000 years due to climate change, reveals new research. The ocean current that brings warm water and shapes weather patterns from the G… [+2766 chars]
articles.description: Experts warn that by 2100, the Gulf Stream System will weaken further by 34 to 45 percent, becoming dangerously close to the tipping point at which the flow becomes unstable
articles.title: Gulf Stream System slows to its weakest in a thousand years, putting U.S., Europe at risk - Study Finds

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.description: With the European Golden Shoe race under way, Goal tallies up the top goalscorers from across the continent's best leagues in 2020-21
articles.title: Duo Bek Sentral Tentukan Kemenangan Manchester City - Goal.com
